text: Chaojin de yuefen, shi ji ge kezhi de yuefen. Fan zai zhe ji ge yue nei jueji chaojin de ren, zai chaojin zhong dang jiechu yin ci, e yan he zhengbian. Fan nimen suo xing de shangong, zhenzhu dou shi zhidao de. Nimen dang yi jingwei zuo lufei, yinwei zui hao de lufei shi jingwei. You lizhi de ren a! Nimen dang jingwei wo
